title.rendered: Implement GitOps at Scale with Argo CD

content.rendered:
A completely automated continuous deployment pipeline is achievable in your Kubernetes environment today. We partnered with Argo CD Lead Alexander Matyushentsev and other Argo CD maintainers to bring you this technical deep dive on how to use Argo CD to implement GitOps at scale and manage distributed clusters from a single control plane.

Read the eBook to learn:

  • How Kubernetes architecture makes GitOps a natural fit
  • How to implement a basic GitOps Kubernetes deployment operator
  • How Argo CD provides enterprise features like single sign on, access control, and declarative management
  • How to get started with CI/CD today

 

Argo CD with Codefresh GitOps can be a game changer for your team. Download the eBook now.
